thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: David Galati
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by David Galati

author: David Galati
title: David Galati
text: Brake performance is my go to place for all my brake needs. Over the past few years I have purchased brake kits for my two S60 Volvos and just recently my 2010 Mini Cooper. Vicky in customer service has been extremely helpful with my latest purchase. I would certainly without any reservations recommend this company!!
